payload.subject: Daily Payout Report — EZ Sports — 2026-02-17
payload.html:
EZ Sports
Daily Payout Report
2026-02-17
Summary
Orders 0
MAP Total $0.00
Wholesale Total $0.00
BB Shipping Amount $0.00
SparQ Digital Fee $0.00
Stripe Fees $0.00
EZ Sports Net Payout $0.00
EZ Sports Net Payout = Cart Total − wholesale − BB Shipping Amount − SparQ Digital fee − Stripe fees
Product Summary
No paid orders found in this period.
Plain-text version
Subject: Daily Payout Report — EZ Sports — 2026-02-17
To:
- EZ Sports Operations
- SparQ Digital
- Better Baseball Fulfillment — hligon@getsparqd.com

Reporting Period
From: 2026-02-17 (12:00 AM)
To: 2026-02-17 (11:59 PM)

Summary Overview
- Total Orders: 0
- Total MAP Sold: $0.00
- Total Wholesale Cost: $0.00
- Total BB Shipping Amount: $0.00
- Total SparQ Digital Fees (1.5%): $0.00
- Total Stripe Processing Fees: $0.00
- Total EZ Sports Net Payout: $0.00
- Total Amount Owed to Better Baseball: $0.00

Product Sales Summary (Aggregated)
This section shows the total quantity or footage sold per product across the day.


Financial Distribution
1. Better Baseball — Wholesale Amount
Total wholesale cost for all products sold today.
- Amount Due to Better Baseball: $0.00
- Send To: Better Baseball
- Email: hligon@getsparqd.com

2. SparQ Digital — Platform Fees
SparQ Digital receives 1.5% of the cart total before taxes.
- Total SparQ Digital Fees: $0.00
- Formula: sum((cart_total − taxes) × 0.015)

3. EZ Sports — Net Payout
Remaining amount after wholesale, BB shipping, SparQ Digital fees, and Stripe processing fees.
- Total EZ Sports Net Payout: $0.00
- Formula:
  sum(cart_total − wholesale − bb_shipping − sparq_fee − stripe_processing_fee)
